fields.title: FoodPlaza
fields.short_description: FoodPlaza is a food delivery web application that connects customers with nearby restaurants for seamless food ordering, tracking, and delivery.
fields.full_description: FoodPlaza is a full-stack food ordering web application built to deliver a smooth and intuitive online food ordering experience. The platform allows users to browse restaurants, view dynamic menus, manage a cart, place orders, and track them in real time. It includes secure user authentication for login and signup, order history with past invoices, and Google Maps integration for accurate location tracking and delivery visibility.
fields.backend_implementation:
Developed the backend using Django with a modular architecture for user management, menu items, orders, and payments.
Implemented secure authentication, order processing, order history, and order status tracking using Django ORM.
Built an admin dashboard to manage orders, track daily revenue, and monitor customer and delivery details.
fields.frontend_implementation:
Designed a responsive and user-friendly interface using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Django templates.
Implemented dynamic menu browsing, cart management, checkout flow, and payment selection.
Developed order confirmation, invoice download, order tracking, and order history user interfaces.
fields.why_this_application: Provides a simple, intuitive, and seamless food ordering experience with real-time order tracking.
fields.features:
User-friendly food ordering system
Restaurant management dashboard
Dynamic menu and cart
Order history and past invoices
Real-time order tracking and status updates
Secure user authentication (login/signup)
Google Maps integration for location tracking
Multiple payment methods (Cash, Card, UPI, etc.)
Downloadable invoice after successful order

fields.title: Prime Store
fields.short_description: Prime Store is a full-stack e-commerce web application built using Django that enables users to browse products, manage carts, and complete secure online purchases with a modern, responsive user interface.
fields.full_description: Prime Store is a full-stack e-commerce web application that enables users to browse products, manage carts, and place orders through a secure and scalable platform.
fields.backend_implementation:
Developed backend using Django with modular apps for authentication, products, cart, and orders.
Implemented secure user authentication and order processing using Django ORM.
Integrated payment gateway and admin panel for product and order management.
fields.frontend_implementation:
Designed responsive UI using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Django templates.
Implemented dynamic features such as search, filters, cart updates, and checkout flow.
Ensured smooth navigation and cross-device compatibility.
fields.why_this_application: Provides a clean, intuitive, and responsive interface for a smooth online shopping experience.
fields.features:
User authentication and authorization
Product listing and detailed product pages
Shopping cart and wishlist functionality
Secure payment gateway integration (Stripe)
Order history and order tracking
Admin dashboard with sales and user analytics
Responsive UI for mobile and desktop
